item.title: Survey response no. 100
item.description: Postcode: 666 666 666 Tenancy: Social housing, council housing Provider: Not provided Duration of problem: why are you anti gentrification, when you style yourself like cultures you didn’t grow up in you fucking hypocritical cunt.
